subject: Re: Read Calligraphy
msgSnippet: I think Read calligraphy is a great idea.  I ve tried a bit with Shavian, but I haven t really worked with QuikScript much.  Those are a bit hard to read, but
messageBody:
I think Read calligraphy is a great idea. I've tried a bit with Shavian, but I haven't really
worked with QuikScript much. Those are a bit hard to read, but they're definitely creative.
Maybe I'll see if I can come up with anything interesting.

I also did a design for a signature using an almost cursive variety of Shavian that could be
easily rendered in QuikScript. You can see that here: http://img.photobucket.com/
albums/v629/WurdBendur/shaw_sig.png

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "khoalb" <albert.v.nguyen@g...> wrote:
> I've been toying with the idea of using the Read alphabet to do
> calligraphy. My motivation was seeing some Arabic calligraphy which
> you can check out at http://www.arabiccalligraphy.com . I'm not much
> of an artist, but I've tried my hand at it. I uploaded two files in
> the Calligraphy folder. Has anyone else done this or thought about
> doing this?

I think Read calligraphy is a great idea.  I've tried a bit with Shavian, but I haven't really 
worked with QuikScript much.  Those are a bit hard to read, but they're definitely creative.  
Maybe I'll see if I can come up with anything interesting.

I also did a design for a signature using an almost cursive variety of Shavian that could be 
easily rendered in QuikScript.  You can see that here: http://img.photobucket.com/
albums/v629/WurdBendur/shaw_sig.png

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "khoalb" <albert.v.nguyen@g...> wrote:
> I've been toying with the idea of using the Read alphabet to do
> calligraphy.  My motivation was seeing some Arabic calligraphy which
> you can check out at http://www.arabiccalligraphy.com .  I'm not much
> of an artist, but I've tried my hand at it.  I uploaded two files in
> the Calligraphy folder.  Has anyone else done this or thought about
> doing this?
